# J8 pin out reference for raspberry pi and maybe others

SD card slot up

|    |        |        |
|----|--------|--------|
| 01 | 3.3v   | 5v     |
| 02 | GPIO2  | 5v     |
| 03 | GPIO3  | GND    |
| 04 | GPIO4  | GPIO14 |
| 05 | GND    | GPIO15 |
| 06 | GPIO17 | GPIO18 |
| 07 | GPIO27 | GND    |
| 08 | GPIO22 | GPIO23 |
| 09 | 3.3v   | GPIO24 |
| 10 | GPIO10 | GND    |
| 11 | GPIO9  | GPIO25 |
| 12 | GPIO11 | GPIO8  |
| 13 | GND    | GPIO7  |
| 14 | GPIO0  | GPIO1  |
| 15 | GPIO5  | GND    |
| 16 | GPIO6  | GPIO12 |
| 17 | GPIO13 | GND    |
| 18 | GPIO19 | GPIO16 |
| 19 | GPIO26 | GPIO20 |
| 20 | GND    | GPIO21 |
